title: Achaari Aloo Gobi: Potato and Cauliflower
directions: Heat a pan with 2 cups of water and a pinch of salt.
Add cauliflower forests and diced potatoes to it. Let them boil for 5 minutes.
Drain excess water and set aside.
Heat oil in another pan. Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, fennel seeds, crushed coriander seeds, onion seeds, and asafoetida and sauté until the seeds splutter.
Add chopped onions and sauté until translucent.
Add cauliflower florets, diced potatoes, crushed ginger, crushed garlic, turmeric powder, curry powder, green chilis, and salt.
Sprinkle in about 2 tablespoons of water, and toss.
Cover and cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.
Add the vegan yogurt and mix well. Cover and cook until the cauliflower is almost cooked. Add kasuri methi and mix well.
Cover and cook for 3 more minutes.
Remove from heat and garnish with chopped coriander leaves.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon asafetida, onion powder, or garlic powder
